actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to treat certain commercially reasonable financing provided to a partnership by a related person as if it were provided by an unrelated lender for purposes of the partnership allocation rules.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to treat certain commercially reasonable financing provided to a partnership by a related person as if it were provided by an unrelated lender for purposes of the partnership allocation rules.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to treat certain commercially reasonable financing provided to a partnership by a related person as if it were provided by an unrelated lender for purposes of the partnership allocation rules.
